document.masterDocTitle: The bees (Hymenoptera: Apoidea) of the Maltese Islands

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The bees (Hymenoptera: Apoidea) of the Maltese Islands

subSubSection.paragraph:
Determined as
Anthidium florentina
in Valletta (1979) .
Previous Reports: Valletta (1979) ; Schembri (1982)

Specimens Examined: 1♂, Wied il-Għasel, 08-vi-1969 , C De Lucca [NMNH]; 1♀, 1♂, Wied il-Għasel, 16-vi- 1969 , C De Lucca [NMNH]; 1♀, Wied il-Għasel, 08-iv-1977 , CJ Aquilina [NMNH]; 2♂, Fawwara, 15-v-1988 , P Sammut [NMNH]; 1♂, Fiddien, 23-v-2014 , P Portelli [NMNH]; 1♂ [NMNH]
Distribution: Continental Europe, Algeria , Middle East and the islands of Cyprus , Sardinia and Sicily .

Anthidium manicatum
(L., 1758)
Specimens Examined: 1♂, Wied il-Għasel, 08-vi-1969 , C De Lucca [NMNH]; 1♀, 1♂, Wied il-Għasel, 12-vi- 1969 , C De Lucca [NMNH]); 3♂, Wied il-Għasel, 16-vi-1969 , C De Lucca [NMNH]; 1♀ [NMNH]
Distribution: Continental Europe, North Africa, Middle East and the islands of Sardinia and Sicily .
Determined as Anthidellum striuatum (Latreille, 1802). Previous Reports: Schembri (1982)
Distribution: Continental Europe, Maghreb, Middle East and the islands of Cyprus and Sicily .

Previous Reports: Kuhlmann et al. (2015)
Distribution: Eastern Mediterranean Basin, Italy , the islands of Cyprus and Sicily .
Distribution: Southern Europe, Turkey , Israel and Cyprus .

Distribution: Southern Europe, Tunisia , Turkey , the islands of Sardinia and Sicily .

Megachile schmiedeknechti
(Costa, 1884)

Determined as
Megachile xanthopyga (Pérez, 1895)
in
Valletta (1971)
but this is synonymised with
M. schmiedeknechti ( Schembri 1982 )
.

Corsica
, Sardinia .

Distribution: Continental Europe, Northwestern Africa,
Corsica
, Sardinia and Sicily .
Previous Reports: Schembri (1982) ; Kuhlmann et al. (2015) Distribution: Continental Europe and Ireland, Northern Africa, Middle East and the islands of Cyprus, Corsica, Sardinia and Sicily.

Previous Reports:
Ungricht et al. (2008)
; Kuhlmann et al. (2015) Distribution: Northern Africa, Italy, Spain and Sardinia.

Distribution: Mediterranean Basin, Switzerland and Germany , and the islands of Cyprus ,
Corsica

by

but this is synonymised with

.

Distribution: Northern Africa, Portugal , Spain , Italy and Sicily .

Determined as
Osmia rufa kohlii (Ducke, 1899)
in Valletta (1971) . Previous Reports: Valletta (1971) ; Schembri (1982) ; Kuhlmann et al. (2015) Specimens Examined: 1♀, 1♂, Ħal Għaxaq, 15-iv-2014 , MV Balzan; 1♂, Wied l-Aħmar (Comino), 13-v- 2014 , P Portelli; 1♂ [NMNH]
Distribution: Southern Italy and Sicily .

Determined as
Anthidium septemdentatum (Latreille, 1809)
in Valletta (1971) . Previous Reports: Valletta (1971) ; Schembri (1982) Distribution: Southern Europe.

Determined as
Anthidium fontanesii (Lepeletier, 1841)
by
Valletta (1971)
and
Anthidium siculum (Spinola, 1838)
by Schembri (1982) but these are synonymised with
R. siculum
.
Previous Reports: Valletta (1971) ; Schembri (1982)
Specimens examined: 1♂, Addolorata,?/07/1948, collector? [NMNH]; 1♂ NMNH]
Distribution: Western Mediterranean Basin, including Sicily .
